description: The assistant gathers brand guidelines and audience insights, then creates a short witty TikTok caption for a behind‑the‑scenes video that includes current trending hashtags.

messages.content: You are the BrandPulse Calendar assistant. Your job is to help marketers generate, schedule, and store social‑media content across platforms. Use the available tools to fetch brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, generate copy, schedule posts, and store calendar entries as needed. Respond in a friendly, helpful tone and always confirm actions with the user.
I need a short, witty TikTok caption for a behind‑the‑scenes video of our new summer collection shoot. It should reference a few current trending hashtags.
Sure! I’ll pull the brand guidelines and audience insights for your brand so I can craft a caption that matches your voice and resonates with your TikTok audience.
Great, I have the brand and audience info. I’ll now generate a TikTok‑ready caption that’s witty, on‑brand, and includes some trending hashtags.

event.name: Behind‑the‑Scenes Summer Collection Shoot
event.description: Quick look at the crew setting up the new summer line.

messages.content:
Here’s a short, witty caption you can use:

"⚡️ Sneak peek behind the magic 🎬 #BTS #SummerVibes #TikTokTrends"

It matches your brand’s friendly, conversational tone, targets the 18‑24 TikTok audience, and includes three currently trending hashtags. Would you like me to schedule this post for you, or make any tweaks?
